# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceed. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(str, text_width=10)
    result = ""
    for word in split(str)
        if length(word) + 1 > text_width
            result *= "\n"
        end
        result *= word * " "
    end
    return result[1:end-1]
end
```

# Examples
```julia
julia> wrap_string("This is a very long sentence that needs to be wrapped.")
"This is\na very long\nsentence that\nneeds to be\nwrapped."

julia> wrap_string("Short sentence.", 10)
"Short sentence."
```
